page.title: 03THE THREE PINES GARAGE
page.content:
The Three Pines is about 15 years old and the owner is A C Gardiner.He hes four staff.Opening hours are 8.00 till 6.00 but on Saturdays they close at 5.00.They have three petrol pumps and one diesel pump.The amount of petrol they sell a week is about 1500 gallons.They do have a service area.Their busiest day is Friday and Saturday and their quietest day is Monday .They also sell sweets, crisps, drinks, tablets, oil, small car-parts, motor accessories, coal,matches,and cigarettes.
JULIE & SIMON
